bibl.title: The Archaeology of the Kellis 2 Cemetery.
bibl.note: A picture of the Kellis 1 Cemetery (early Roman period) and the Kellis 2 Cemetery (Christian period). - Pp. 138-139: 2 examples of leprosy.

bibl.title: Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: SHELDRICK Peter, The Archaeology of the Kellis 2 Cemetery.

Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12 (Oxford, 2008) pp. 137-139.
A picture of the Kellis 1 Cemetery (early Roman period) and the Kellis 2 Cemetery (Christian period). - Pp. 138-139: 2 examples of leprosy.
